trans-unit.source:
Shortdesc

  1. The short description is mandatory.

  2. Enter the short description in the shortdesc tag, directly below the title at the top of the info object.

  3. Give a short description of the purpose of the user interface element.

    The short description only appears in the carousel, it will not be displayed in the entire topic that appears next to the hotspot when users click on it on the UI. Often, the information in the short description is key information that should be read by the user first. Therefore, it might make sense to use this information again in the ConBody, since this text appears directly next to the hotspot – where a user presumably starts reading.

  4. Write one sentence with up to 70 characters. WebAssistant only displays 3 rows in the carousel and translation may need some extra characters. As WebAssistant uses a variable-width font, where the characters differ in size from one another, we cannot tell exactly how many characters are shown. Always check in WebAssistant, if your short descriptions gets cut off.

  5. For technical reasons to do with the way that content is displayed in WebAssistant, you may not leave the tag conbody empty. If the short description is sufficient as primary help, you have to copy the text of the short description into a paragraph in the conbody.

Specify minimum waiting time of an order at the work center

  5. For technical reasons to do with the way that content is displayed in WebAssistant, you may not leave the tag conbody empty. If the short description is sufficient as primary help, you have to copy the text of the short description into a paragraph in the conbody.

Specify minimum waiting time of an order at the work center

When translating from English, the translation of this section should have a maximum of 100 characters. If translating <emphasis>to</emphasis> English, the translation should have a maximum of 70 characters, as it will later be translated to other languages that may need more space.

When translating from English, the translation of this section should have a maximum of 100 characters. If translating <emphasis>to</emphasis> English, the translation should have a maximum of 70 characters, as it will later be translated to other languages that may need more space.

When translating from English, the translation of this section should have a maximum of 100 characters. If translating <emphasis>to</emphasis> English, the translation should have a maximum of 70 characters, as it will later be translated to other languages that may need more space.
You can categorize business partners by assigning them to one or more industries.

seg-source.mrk: You can categorize business partners by assigning them to one or more industries.

target.mrk: 可通过将业务伙伴分配到一个或多个行业对其进行分类。

trans-unit.source:
1. This section is optional.

  2. Answer the questions: Under what circumstances does the user use the UI element? What should the user enter in this field and why? What happens when the user enters a specific value or selects a checkbox?

  3. Only mention and explain input values or fixed values when the user needs this information to decide which value to select. If there are predefined values, the user can access them via the value help. If necessary, explain to the user what a value in a read-only field signifies.

  4. Only explain what happens when a checkbox or radio button is not selected when this has unexpected results for the user or when the result is not the opposite of a selected checkbox.

For a goods receipt with reference to a purchase order or to a production order, the system automatically calculates the number of goods receipt slips to be printed for material document items. The number is a quotient of the quantity of goods received and the number specified here. The calculated value is rounded up to the next whole number. If you do not enter a value, the material document is printed on only one goods receipt slip.

You can assign one or more industry systems to a customer master record.

seg-source.mrk: You can assign one or more industry systems to a customer master record.

target.mrk: 可为客户主记录分配一个或多个行业系统。

trans-unit.source: Choose an <uicontrol>Industry System</uicontrol> using the value help.

seg-source.mrk: Choose an <uicontrol>Industry System</uicontrol> using the value help.

target.mrk: 使用值帮助选择<uicontrol>行业系统</uicontrol>。

trans-unit.source: Choose the required <uicontrol>Industry</uicontrol> using the value help.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the required <uicontrol>Industry</uicontrol> using the value help.

target.mrk: 使用值帮助选择所需的<uicontrol>行业</uicontrol>。

trans-unit.source: If the selected industry is the standard industry of the customer, set the <uicontrol>Standard Industry</uicontrol> indicator.

seg-source.mrk: If the selected industry is the standard industry of the customer, set the <uicontrol>Standard Industry</uicontrol> indicator.

target.mrk: 如果所选行业是客户的标准行业，请设置<uicontrol>标准行业</uicontrol>标识。
